[Music]
ben and jerry are two of three alpacas
we've had on the farm over the last few
years we've very unfortunately lost one
of their where their close friends tom
but all three of them were part of a
huge amount of stage and screen
appearances they've been in star wars
they've been in their own short gangster
film which is coming out soon they were
in a sort of fashion magazine shoot and
they've been a whole host of adverts
from things like orange juice to cassie
online casinos and everything in between
the alpacas are such a big attraction
for movies because they are just weird
and wonderful the big tall necks the big
bug eyes just they're something
different they're just really odd
looking and i think people um want that
for their movies they want weird and
wonderful i think the alpacas bring a
real sense of community to the area and
we have them outside in the paddocks and
people see them and they're just so
transfixed by them such an odd looking
out of place sort of character that it
really draws people in and allows us to
have a conversation the plan is to
retire um ben and jerry because when we
lost their poor um friend tom we
realized that they were getting towards
the end of their natural lives so it's
time to give them a bit of time off from
public facing things really sad that
they're leaving they've been here the
longest out of all the animals and
they're such amazing alpacas they're
really friendly and such easy to work
with they give back as much as they get
from us and from the from the public
about that really positive feeling and
just generally feeling connected to
nature
you
